markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scout's Speed](/Feats.aspx?ID=6398) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 212 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Scout](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=261)

**Prerequisites**
[Scout Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6394)

</column>

---

You move faster, especially when traveling, allowing you to scout out ahead and report back without slowing your allies. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed. When calculating your[ travel speed](/Rules.aspx?ID=2370), this increases to a +20-foot status bonus.
name: Scout's Speed

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 6" pfs="Standard" > Scout's Speed Source Player Core 2 pg. 212 1.1 Archetype Scout Prerequisites Scout Dedication --- You move faster, especially when traveling, allowing you to scout out ahead and report back without slowing your allies.
